duties_responsibilities.duty: Grow and develop the agribusiness through relationship building and collaborative efforts across departments.
Identify market needs and opportunities for growth and innovation within the global agricultural supply chain.
Network and leverage existing relationships to drive business growth and expansion.
Provide customer service and support to farmers, grain processors, renewable energy producers, and manufacturers of food, animal feed, aquafeed and pet food.
Work in high-volume environments to buy, sell, store, handle, and process grain and ingredients.
Work collaboratively with teams to provide safe, innovative, and reliable solutions to meet market demands.
Lead and engage in community involvement and give back on campus and globally.
Adapt to and thrive in various global locations based on experiences and business needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Agriculture, or a related field (Master's preferred)
